The Product description Field needs to be BLANK in some cases, we are still not allowed to do this. 5. On News items the Document tag simply says ‘Doc’ would it be okay to change that to PDF Download 6. On news item The document tag actually gives the user the full address; could this be masked to PDF Download as well? 7. Can the forms we have incorporate the following ‘option’ near the bottom?

- scroll to selected range in ranges menu.
- Ensure prods in cat are ordered by highlighted. - Layout bug with lowerContent div - Remove pagination
- ensure killing ranges kills dep products
- Google analytics - Secure all admin routes

- Tidy svn before Rails 3 upgrade - Switch off acts as friendly param filter (breaks locally)
- localize static left nav labels - Infrastructure to localize tag/category labels (associated products don't need to be re-tagged) - Remove duplicate contact form

- Workaround library conflict of I18n and is_taggabe (conflict with of_kind method) - Bump Rails to 2.3.5 - Remove translation of tag kind, not required as we associate with the English kind (type,room) and just translate the label.
- Remove the sass generated css. It gets created upon page request - Regenerated application.sass from the css using sass-convert
- Home page localisation - Meta tags for (fr,de) NB: watch for i18n 0.5.0 gem as breaks interpolation of error messages locally!
